comment._content: Yes wonderful quality. You have to feel for the 2 boys, 6 sisters!! And the little one at the front, what is she holding? Looks like a back scrubber!

comment.author: 57241905@N03
comment._content: Great  photo. Large family.( Like my mother's family )

comment.author: 39191857@N05
comment._content: I can see why you like it Carol, it really is a very beautiful portrait and even a modern photographer would like one as good as that.

comment.author: 99684904@N00
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/56105315@N07] The girls are holding some sort of sports game I think, like tennis but with a net.
Could be a kids version of Badminton.
I have seen it before.
The girl on the right is holding one as well, the one in the middle either has a cover or is a younger kids version.
Back then it was common to photograph kids with props like toys.

They look like a happy family, smiles in family portraits are something you didn't always see in such photos.
I would have loved to be this family's guest for dinner.

comment.author: 38896199@N06
comment._content: It is quite obvious the photographer was standing to the right of the camera too as they all seem focused on him. It is pin-sharp and is a cracking example of a family portrait.
